definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous

sentences.english: Last week, Ingushetia's construction minister was shot to death in his own office.
sentences.chinese: 上周，印古什共和国建设部长在其办公室被枪杀。

sentences.english: The President, in June, was seriously injured in an attack.
sentences.chinese: 六月份，印古什总统在袭击中深受重伤。

sentences.english: The president of Ingushetia was severely wounded in an apparent assassination attempt on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 在周一的刺杀事件中，印古什共和国总统身受重伤。

sentences.english: The men stopped their vehicle soon after crossing into Ingushetia.
sentences.chinese: 当时，绑架者在进入印古什共和国之后很快停下了车。

sentences.english: Her kidnappers headed in the direction of Ingushetia, Chechnya's neighbouring republic.
sentences.chinese: 绑架者们朝着印古什，车臣的邻接共和国飞驰。

definition: Chechnya, a republic in southwestern Russia/Chechen
Choibalsan, city in Mongolia, capital of the eastern aimag (province) of Dornod/Khorloogiin Choibalsan (1895-1952), Communist leader of the Mongolian People's Republic (mid-1930s-1952)
Yeltsin (name)/Boris Yeltsin (1931-2007) first post-communist president of Russia 1991-1999

pinyin: Meng3 gu3 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Turkmenistan/Republic of Turkmenistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Iran
